meanings.definition: To make complex or more complex.
meanings.sent1: She tried to complexify the puzzle by adding more pieces.
meanings.sent2: The instructions only served to complexify the situation further.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to complexify the recipe with unusual ingredients resulted in a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The artist's use of vibrant colors helped complexify the painting, adding depth and emotion.
meanings.sent5: The new software update will complexify the user interface, making it more challenging to navigate.
